3.name: Tavern Customer
3.text:
"Isk-san, was it? That person is always stationed
in front of the bard all day long, continuously
listening to heroic tales and muttering 'respect',
'die', 'impossible' under their breath..."

4.name: Tavern Customer
4.text:
"I see, so it was a dragon... In that case, it's
understandable for them to be eccentric...
(glance)"

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"I feel like there's some kind of rumor damage
related to the dragon!!!"

8.name: Barkeeper
8.text:
"Hey Sol-chan. You look lively today as well! Let
me treat you to a meal!"

9.name: Sol
9.text: "Yay! A feast! I wonder what I can eat!"

10.name: Barkeep
10.text: "(I guess it's a dog after all...)"

13.name: Mother
13.text: "Oh, what a lovely dragon. Hello there."

14.name: Sol
14.text: "Ehehe, hello! It's a dragon, you know!"

16.name: Villager
16.text:
"Oh, Golden Dragon-sama...!! You look as beautiful
as ever today...!!"

22.name: Aunt
22.text:
"Oh my, Sol-chan, you're so lively and cute today!
Here, take this meat pie! Eat a lot and grow big!"

23.name: Sol
23.text:
"Thank you, Auntie! Ehehe, I'm so happy, it's
delicious! Munch munch"

25.name: Old man
25.text:
"Ohh! Sol-chan! Your tail looks as good as ever!
Here, take this apple!"

26.name: Sol
26.text:
"Yaaay, thank you, old man! But only looking at my
tail is sexual harassment, you know?"

28.name: Minstrel
28.text:
"Oh my, to think I would have the honor of seeing
Lady Gold Dragon today! When you have a great day,
please allow me to dedicate a poem to you!"

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"Ooooo... my heroic tale!! It's embarrassing yet
delightful!!"

31.name: Priest
31.text:
"Oh, young lady of the golden dragon, welcome. Are
you here for worship today?"

32.name: Sol
32.text: "Ehehe, I'm going to pray to my mother!"

35.name: Adventurer
35.text: "Hey, Sol-chan! You look lively as ever!"

36.name: Sol
36.text: "Ehehe, everyone seems to be doing well too!"

38.name: Adventurer
38.text: "Hey, Lady Gold Dragon! Are you making a profit?"

41.name: Adventurer
41.text:
"Oh my, Lady Gold Dragon. You seem to be in good
spirits today as well."

44.name: Adventurer
44.text:
"Good day, Sol-san. Have you caught a cold or
anything?"

45.name: Sol
45.text: "Good day! I'm full of energy today too!"
